attributes.action: ensure that single people living alone earning under £16k per annum are compensated by receiving a reduced rate of tax, and receive single persons tax credit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This will help people living independently, contribute better to society. People in this position have a better understanding of living, and will be able to create more stable and better families.


Giving them a "Single persons Tax Credit" will allow them to feed themselves properly, have a social life, and create strong stable families, which will be able to contribute better towards the economy, contribute better work and creative talent for Britain, and help create a more stable nation, rooted more in good solid social values.
